#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		int n,k,co=0,i,j,ii,jj;
		cin>>n>>k;
		char a[21][21];
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
	     cin>>a[i][j];
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
			{
				if(a[i][j]=='.')
				{
					co++;
				    for(ii=i-1;ii>=1;ii--)
				    if(a[ii][j]=='X') co++;else break;
				    for(ii=i+1;ii<=n;ii++)
				    if(a[ii][j]=='X') co++;else break;
				    if(co>=k) break;else co=1;
				    for(jj=j-1;jj>=1;jj--)
				    if(a[i][jj]=='X') co++; else break;
				    for(jj=j+1;jj<=n;jj++)
				    if(a[i][jj]=='X') co++;else break;
				    if(co>=k) break; else co=1;
				    for(ii=i-1,jj=j+1;ii>=1&&jj<=n;ii--,jj++)
				    if(a[ii][jj]=='X') co++;else break;
				    for(ii=i+1,jj=j-1;ii<=n&&jj>=1;ii++,jj--)
				    if(a[ii][jj]=='X') co++;else break;
				    if(co>=k) break; else co=1;
				    for(ii=i-1,jj=j-1;ii>=1&&jj>=1;ii--,jj--)
				    if(a[ii][jj]=='X') co++;else break;
				    for(ii=i+1,jj=j+1;ii<=n&&jj<=n;ii++,jj++)
				    if(a[ii][jj]=='X') co++;else break;
				    if(co>=k) break; else co=0;
			    }
			}
			if(co>=k)
			break;
		}
		if(co>=k)
		cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
}
